agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Water & Rural Affairs TIME & DATE: 3:30 PM, Monday, March 25, 2019 PLACE: E1.012 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Charles Perry SB 407 Birdwell Relating to the presiding officers of the boards of directors of river authorities. SB 606 Watson | et al. Relating to the Lower Colorado River Authority, following recommendations of the Sunset Advisory Commission. SB 625 Birdwell | et al. Relating to the Nueces River Authority, following recommendations of the Sunset Advisory Commission. SB 626 Birdwell | et al. Relating to the Guadalupe-Blanco River Authority; following the recommendations of the Sunset Advisory Commission. SB 627 Birdwell | et al. Relating to the Red River Authority, following recommendations of the Sunset Advisory Commission. SB 700 Nichols | et al. Relating to the regulation of certain classes of retail public water utilities. SB 1010 Perry Relating to rules adopted by groundwater conservation districts overlying a common aquifer. SB 1574 Alvarado Relating to the duties of the Texas Water Development Board. Public testimony will be limited to 2 minutes. If submitting written testimony, please provide 10 copies to the committee clerk with your name and bill number on each copy. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
